system.levelAdaptation:
After level 5: +D6+2 damage

After level 10: +15 Health, +D10 damage, +10 Combat Skill

actions.name: Rampaging Charge
actions.description: The Carnage Devourer charges forward in a straight line, trampling everything in its path. Each creature engaged with it in combat must make a Dodge check or receive 2D8 Bludgeoning damage and be knocked Prone.

actions.name: Flamebrand Cleave (Physical)
actions.description: The Carnage Devourer brings down its massive cleaver in a sweeping arc, targeting all creatures in the room and dealing D6 Slashing damage. Targets hit by this attack must also pass an Endurance check or receive the Burning condition.

actions.name: Earthshaker Slam
actions.description: The Carnage Devourer slams its cleaver into the ground with tremendous force, creating a shockwave of splintered earth. All creatures must make an Acrobatics check or be knocked Prone and take D6 Bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Rage Unleashed
actions.description: The Carnage Devourer's fury intensifies, granting it Advantage on all attack rolls and increasing its damage by D6 for 2 rounds. During this time, it cannot be Frightened or Charmed.

actions.name: Annihilation Roar (Magical)
actions.description: The Carnage Devourer releases a deafening roar that chills the hearts of its foes. All creatures must make a Resolve check or be Frightened (20).

actions.name: Devouring Blaze (Magical)
actions.description: The Carnage Devourer summons forth a torrent of flames, forcing all creatures to make a Dodge check or take D6 Fire damage and be set ablaze, suffering from the Burning condition.

system.description: The Carnage Devourer, a relentless embodiment of chaos and destruction, strides as a colossal juggernaut, a living embodiment of raw carnage made to spread death and suffering. With its monstrous cleaver, it tears through both armor and flesh with ease. As it marches, it leaves a trail of roaring flames that consume all in its path, furthering fueling its voracious appetite for annihilation.
